_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: GeyserConnect
author: support@geysermc.org
description: GeyserConnect is an easy way for Bedrock Edition clients to connect to any Java Edition servers without having to run anything.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# GeyserConnect Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
GEYSER_HASH=`curl -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest | jq -r .downloads.standalone.sha256`
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/standalone
echo "${GEYSER_HASH} ${SERVER_JARFILE}" | sha256sum -c
RESULT=$?
if [[ $RESULT -eq 0 ]]; then
echo "Geyser SHA256 match"
else
echo "SHA256 does not match! Aborting..."
rm ${SERVER_JARFILE}
exit 1
fi
curl -o config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/master/core/src/main/resources/config.yml
mkdir extensions
echo "Downloading latest GeyserConnect"
curl -o geyserconnect.zip -L https://nightly.link/GeyserMC/GeyserConnect/workflows/build/${UPDATE_BRANCH}/GeyserConnect.zip
unzip -d extensions geyserconnect.zip
rm geyserconnect.zip

variables.name: Geyser JAR
variables.description:
Server Jarfile, by default this is set to 'geyser.jar'.
Set it to otherwise if you wish to have a different jarfile name.

variables.name: Branch
variables.description: The branch to fetch when downloading GeyserConnect
